Employer to pay reparations to scaffolder Jahden Nelson who lost both arms after electric shock in West Auckland workplace accident https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/employer-to-pay-reparations-to-scaffolder-jahden-nelson-who-lost-both-arms-after-electric-shock-in-west-auckland-工作场所事故/Q76SF4SNVBAY7DBX25A4F7DQZU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/employer-to-pay-reparations-to-scaffolder-jahden-nelson-who-lost-both-arms-after-electric-shock-in-west-auckland-工作场所事故/Q76SF4SNVBAY7DBX25A4F7DQZU/ Katie Harris'My children are limited to a lifestyle they should never have been exposed to.' Mon, 13 Nov 2023 04:01:00 +0000 Jahden Nelson in hospital with his children Valley Rose and Kaiser.
Nelson electrician Stephen Burton’s failure to carry out ‘simple task’ linked to death of builder Craig Johnston https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nelson-electrician-stephen-burtons-failure-to-carry-out-simple-task-linked-to-death-of-builder-craig-johnston/FPM5HK5DVNHNDNRWASXMBV56XA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nelson-electrician-stephen-burtons-failure-to-carry-out-simple-task-linked-to-death-of-builder-craig-johnston/FPM5HK5DVNHNDNRWASXMBV56XA/ Tracy NealHire a Hubby Craig Johnston was found lying motionless on the floor by the homeowner. Mon, 13 Nov 2023 04:00:00 +0000 Nelson builder Craig Johnston died in March 2020 as a result of an electric shock. Electrician Steve Burton (inset) has been convicted after a charge laid by WorkSafe NZ has been proven.
